name: Color Jump - A Color Matching Game
name_original: Color Jump - A Color Matching Game
description:
Color Jump is a 3D touch enabled game for your iPhone,iPad,iPod and Apple Watch.
Tap or 3D Touch to rotate the polygon to the correct color before the ball collides or it's GAME OVER! How long can you last in this crazy game??

Features:
-3D touch enabled gameplay
-Support Apple Watch
-Amazing graphics
-Simple and intuitive controls
-Easy to start but hard to master
